Detailed Description

A class to handle the game's logic, the representation of the board is a vector of unique_ptr of the 'Piece' class.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

◆ Board()

Chess::Board::Board ( const string &  fenStr = "rnbqkbnr/pppppppp/8/8/8/8/PPPPPPPP/RNBQKBNR w KQkq - 0 1")

The constructor, takes an optional parameter to load an FEN string.

Parameters
fenStrthe FEN string, initial state of the board.

◆ getIndexOfPieceAt()

unsigned Chess::Board::getIndexOfPieceAt ( const string &  pos,
const PieceColor &  colorToBeDifferentFrom = NONE,
const bool &  aliveState = true 
)

Get index (in the vector of pieces) of a piece.

Parameters
posposition of the piece
colorToBeDifferentFrom(optional) the color of the enemy's pieces.
alivestate(optional) whether the piece is on the board (if a piece is taken it stays in the vector, but in a dead state).
Returns
index of the piece if it was found, otherwise 65.
